text: Zhaleh Kazemi (1944–2003) was a famous Iranian television producer, news anchor and painter. She was also a voice actress for Persian-dubbed films in Iranian cinema. ==See also== * Islamic art * Iranian art * Islamic calligraphy * List of Iranian artists == Sources == * Zhaleh Kazemi (in Persian) Category:Iranian women painters Category:1944 births Category:2003 deaths Category:20th-century Iranian painters Category:20th-century women artists Category:Iranian voice actresses Category:Iranian radio and television presenters
title: Zhaleh Kazemi
